Methods¶

stockservice._iteritems(_dict)¶
Internal method to factor-out Py2-to-3 differences in dictionary item
iterator methods
Parameters:_dict (dict) – the dictionary to parse
Returns:the iterable dictionary
stockservice._get(url)¶

Internal method to convert a URL into it’s response (a str).

Parameters:url (str) – the url to request a response from
Returns:the str response
stockservice._urlencode(query, params)¶

Internal method to combine the url and params into a single url string.

Parameters:
  • query (str) – the base url to query
  • params (dict) – the parameters to send to the url
Returns:

a str of the full url
stockservice._lookup(key)¶

Internal method that looks up a key in the local cache.

Parameters:key (string) – Get the value based on the key from the cache.
Returns:void
stockservice._recursively_convert_unicode_to_str(input)¶

Force the given input to only use str instead of bytes or unicode.

This works even if the input is a dict, list,

stockservice.connect()¶

Connect to the online data source in order to get up-to-date information.

Returns:void
stockservice.disconnect()¶

Connect to the local cache, so no internet connection is required.

Returns:void
stockservice._fetch_stock_info(params)¶

Internal method to form and query the server

Parameters:params (dict) – the parameters to pass to the server
Returns:the JSON response object
stockservice.get_stock_information(tickers)¶

Retrieves current stock information.
